name: Polly Shelly: Phantom Acrabatics
description:
CONCEPT

You are a CRAB with GRAPPLING HOOK CLAWS, SEEKING your CRABELOVED at the end of the world -or at least the kitchen- to save them from their doom! SWING and BASH enemies,  EXPLORE the haunted restaurant and SAVE your crabeloved.

Additional Information: If you are fearful of cockroaches, or simply do not want to encounter them: Simply turn on peaceful mode in the settings!!

CONTROLS WASD: MovementSPACE: Jump
ESCAPE: Pause
SHIFT: Cancel Grappling Pull
LEFT/RIGHT MOUSE CLICK: Shoot Left/Right Claw
